text: Appreciation for <@UC6V0FAJW> fixing many lingering bugs, adding functionality and improving the API of VideoIO’s encoder. Just check out this changelog for v0.9 that just released <https://github.com/JuliaIO/VideoIO.jl/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md>
